timeline.bodyText:
Do we want only this version of the method or we want to support passing attrNames - since we retrieve RichUsers exactly to get their attributes too. And what about combination with vo, extSourceName, extLogin and again optionally attrNames?
You can add more versions of the same method using same pattern as in below method, where you append /someString to the URL.
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Second version of this method was added. For optional parameter attrNames I used already defined paramter attrNamesOptional.
replies.author: HejdaJakub
